bmi.title: Calculate Your BMI
bmi.bmiExplanation: The Body Mass Index (BMI) is a simple calculation using a person's height and weight. The formula is BMI = kg/m² where kg is a person's weight in kilograms and m² is their height in meters squared.
bmi.bmiCategories2: A BMI of 18.5-24.9 indicates a normal weight for height, while a BMI lower than 18.5 suggests underweight. A BMI between 25-29.9 indicates overweight, and 30 or over suggests obesity.
